title: Nvidia GeForce Now app is now native on Apple M1
content:
GeForce Now is Nvidia’s game streaming platform, built to play Windows-based PC games on the cloud across desktop and mobile platforms. Nvidia just released a new update for the GeForce Now service, which includes an M1-native Mac app. GeForce Now has been available in web browsers for a few months now (many of which are

The post Nvidia GeForce Now app is now native on Apple M1 appeared first on XDA.
description: Nvidia has updated the GeForce Now app on macOS to run natively on M1 Mac computers. More games have also been added to the service.
